sound mix: Digitrac Digital Audio System::(RCA Sound Recording)
plot outline: The uneducated Billu, returns after several year from city. He came to know that villagers does not have work even having agricultural land. He canvases state & central govt schemes with the help of his friends and when bureaucrat refuses he write letter to Prime Minister thus he changes the face of undeveloped Chakallaspur.
title: Chakallaspur
plot: _Chakallaspur_ (qv) story narrates how an uneducated Billu get recognition from government for his village and changes lives of villagers from facing difficulties.

The uneducated Billu, returns after several year from city. He came to know that villagers does not have work even having agricultural land. He canvases state & central govt schemes with the help of his friends and when bureaucrat refuses he write letter to Prime Minister thus he changes the face of undeveloped _Chakallaspur_ (qv).::MN Gujar
